member.name: P:Enterprise.MediatR.Options.MediatRConfigOptions.EnableMediatR
member.summary: Determines if MediatR services will be registered. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Enterprise.MediatR.Options.MediatRConfigOptions.GetServicesFromAssemblies
member.summary: Delegate that provides the assemblies containing the MediatR handlers. These implement IRequestHandler, INotificationHandler, etc.
